body: I don't really get this friend strategy.  If it's a friend, it's part of the API, why not just make it a method?
body_html: I don't really get this friend strategy. If it's a friend, it's part of the API, why not just make it a method?
body_text: I don't really get this friend strategy.  If it's a friend, it's part of the API, why not just make it a method?
